name: JG Agendas
description:
JGAgendasApp is an online appointment management solution that allows businesses, professionals, and centers to easily and quickly optimize their scheduling of appointments.

Some of its main features are:
For Businesses/Professionals:
- Registration of the business/profession on the platform
- Configuration of profile with relevant information
- Definition of schedules, professional staff, and administrative support
- Direct management of the appointment calendar without intermediaries
- Full control over appointment scheduling

For Users/Clients:
- Registration on the platform
- Selection of day and time to book an appointment
- Receipt of appointment reminders via email

The platform is designed to adapt to various industries such as health, beauty, sports, legal services, education, auto repair shops, etc. It offers a free 60-day trial with all features enabled.

JGAgendasApp promises to save money by allowing businesses to achieve the same results as appointment booking agencies, as well as ensuring up to 40% attendance at appointments by sending automated reminders to clients.

Some key benefits highlighted are being online 24/7, personalized schedules, and automated reminders to prevent missed appointments.
